price: 103. Bakolobana kati na bango ete: Bowumelaki na mokili sé mikolo zomi.
arabic: يَتَخَٰفَتُونَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا عَشۡرٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: yatakhāfatūna baynahum in labith'tum illā ʿashran
